content: together with the first and last instep stitches k1 p1 6 times instep cont in pattern keeping instep stitches in k1 p1 rib and sole stitches in stockinette stitch until work measures 2 5 cm from back of heel toe shaping round 1 k4 k2tog 4 times 20 sts rem round 2 k round 3 k round 4 k3 k2tog 4 times 16 sts rem round 5 k round 6 k2 k2tog 4 times 12 sts rem round 7 k round 8 k1 k2tog 4 times 8 sts rem cut yarn pull tail through rem sts fasten_off weave in ends - 4 -
